home.intro: Parsis Foundation is a family foundation of the House of Pahlavi, supporting the global Parsi diaspora through scholarships, heritage preservation, health initiatives, and cultural bridges.
home.quote: Good thoughts, good words, good deeds—the eternal principles guiding our mission.
home.legacyText1: The Parsi community has preserved Zoroastrian traditions for over a millennium, maintaining a rich cultural heritage while contributing to societies worldwide.
home.legacyText2: Parsis Foundation bridges generations by connecting youth with their heritage while supporting education, community health, and cultural preservation programs globally.
home.legacyQuote: We honor the sacred fire that has burned for millennia—a symbol of truth, righteousness, and the eternal light of wisdom.
home.valuesDescription: Humata, Hukhta, Hvarshta—Good Thoughts, Good Words, Good Deeds. These ancient principles guide our commitment to education, community, and service.
home.communityDesc: Strengthening bonds across the global Parsi diaspora
home.generosityDesc: Investing in scholarships and academic excellence
home.inclusivityDesc: Preserving Zoroastrian culture for future generations

biography.title: About
biography.headline: About Parsis Foundation
biography.subtitle: A family foundation of the House of Pahlavi dedicated to supporting the global Parsi Zoroastrian community through education, heritage preservation, and community development.
biography.earlyLifeText: Parsis Foundation empowers the global Parsi diaspora through scholarships for youth in STEM, arts, and cultural studies; grants for fire temples and heritage sites; language preservation programs; and community health initiatives.
biography.educationText: We take a long-term, values-driven approach to philanthropy. Our programs are designed to create lasting impact across generations, preserving heritage while empowering the next generation of Parsi leaders.
biography.residenceText: Based in Switzerland with global reach, we serve Parsi communities in India, North America, Europe, Australia, and heritage sites worldwide.
biography.artisticPracticeText1: The Pahlavi family has a deep connection to Persian and Zoroastrian heritage. Through Parsis Foundation, we channel resources toward preserving this legacy for future generations.
biography.artisticPracticeText2: We maintain full transparency in our programs and partner with established Parsi associations, fire temples, and community organizations worldwide.
biography.exhibitionsSubtitle: Direct support for Parsi communities worldwide
biography.humanitarianText1: Our programs reach Parsi communities across India, North America, Europe, and Australia—providing scholarships, supporting fire temples, and funding health clinics.
biography.humanitarianText2: We partner with established Parsi associations, fire temples, and community organizations to maximize impact and ensure cultural authenticity.
biography.civicTechSubtitle: Partner with us to support the Parsi community
biography.professionalText1: Parsis Foundation is led by the Pahlavi family with guidance from advisors with expertise in Zoroastrian heritage, education, and community development.
biography.professionalText2: Our structure ensures accountability and alignment with our mission to serve the global Parsi community.

mission.title: What We Do
mission.headline: Supporting the Global Parsi Community
mission.subtitle: Our programs focus on education, heritage preservation, community health, and cultural connection—serving Parsi Zoroastrians worldwide.

sustainability.title: Education & Scholarships
sustainability.description: Merit-based scholarships for Parsi youth pursuing excellence in STEM, arts, Persian studies, and leadership development. We invest in the next generation of Parsi leaders.
sustainability.quote: Education empowers the next generation to carry forward our heritage while excelling in the modern world.

coexistence.title: Heritage Preservation
coexistence.description: Grants supporting fire temples in India and diaspora communities, language preservation programs for Avestan and Gujarati, and cultural festivals including Nowruz and Navjote ceremonies.
coexistence.quote: Preserving our sacred traditions ensures that the light of Zoroastrian wisdom continues for future generations.

education.title: Community Health
education.description: Health clinics serving Parsi communities, elder care programs, women's empowerment initiatives, and wellness services across diaspora hubs in India, North America, and beyond.
education.quote: A healthy community is a thriving community. We support wellness at every stage of life.

cooperation.title: Cultural Programs
cooperation.description: Connecting Parsi youth with their heritage through educational programs, community events, and intergenerational mentorship. Supporting Zoroastrian studies at universities worldwide.
cooperation.quote: Our culture is our strength. We build bridges between generations and across continents.

prosperity.title: Global Outreach
prosperity.description: Serving Parsi communities in India, the Americas, Europe, Australia, and beyond. Our programs reach wherever Parsis live and thrive.
prosperity.quote: Wherever Parsis live, we are there to support education, heritage, and community wellbeing.

identity.title: Research & Documentation
identity.description: Supporting academic research into Zoroastrian history, theology, and culture. Documenting oral histories and preserving manuscripts for future generations.
identity.quote: Understanding our past illuminates our path forward.
